text: Recollections of Pavlovsk () is a 1984 Soviet short documentary film directed by Irina Kalinina. At the 57th Academy Awards it was nominated for Best Documentary Short. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1984 films Category:1984 short films Category:1984 documentary films Category:Soviet films Category:Soviet documentary films Category:Russian-language films Category:Short documentary films
title: Recollections of Pavlovsk
